title: Bronze Scrub looking to get better
body:
Hello everyone, i'm Retap.
I am a bronze Pleb who wants to climb.
i am looking for anyone perhaps gold+ to coach me.
I am not looking for a paid coach, but a free one.
So if you're bored or just want to help a brother out, add me.
thanks!
P.S: Please help me get out of this elo hell i live in ;-;
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
yeah hello, I guess technically I count as a "Free Couch".
I did have my blue ribbon meaning I was a Instructor but that was removed after me not playing for 1 month.
Anyway, I've looked through your match history and Ill try and help out as much as I can.

Alright first off.
--------------------------------------
MATCH HISTORY:
not a good positive score(s)
dying a lot in most games.
CSing is really poor.
(80 CS per 10 mins is the minimum)

Examples.
Akali game: 60 CS for 35 mins should be about 240 CS.
Fizz Game: 94 CS by 40 mins should be about 320 CS.

Only upgraded trinkets once, in the past few games.

Builds seem OK, not great. Cant tell what was rushed first.

RUNES:
Gates: I have an issue with the CDR runes, either decrees to 5% or go too 10%
Most recommend going 10% as all items now go 10% CDR and dont have 5% anymore.
reason, you are potentially wasted almost all of your CDR runes if they stay like that, even if you decrees you will either have 35% or 45% which you cant
as 40% is the limit.
But if you go 10% then you only need 2-3 items to reach 40%.

Also scaling HP I dont think is good at all.
replace with armor, even if its scaling armor.

YAS/ADC:
only issues are with HP at lvl 18 and crit dmg.
as Yasuo sure its easy to get 100% crit chance, and crit dmg slightly helps with your 5% decrees in dmg.
But in the end pure dmg ends up being way better countering the 5% nerf.
HP at lvl 18 is redundant with armor / armor per lvl.

MASTERIES.
"Press w to cry"
Im assuming this is for xin jungle, then why didnt you get jungle masteries?
You've gone STR of the aegis, but then gotten AP masteries in offensive?

"Lee sin you filthy fk"
Im also assuming again that this is leesin jungle. Then why have bond of stone?
and no jungle masteries.

Here is a link to some of the runes I've used and why I've used them.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/fGgHBJAu-runes-and-masteries-discussing-what-i-use-and-what-to-know-what-everyone-else-uses

For more info on the volunteer program.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Abb3ru0g-boards-moderation-revamp-visible-moderation-now-live

--------------------------------------------------

Also check this out.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI

There have been many more people like you asking for help.
I do stuff (When I have the time, I'm slow, I like to sleep a lot) and help bronze summoners like yourself.
The first three games the one that has morgana and the next two after that, that guy has now reached silver 4.
Boy was I proud, most of it will be hard work.

But if that guy can go from Bronze 4 to Silver 4 by himself with just a little bit of help then you should be able too as well.

Now, you've taken the first step and admitted you need help.
But its gonna be hard, its not gonna happen over a week or a few days.
That guy has kept at it from (When ever that vid was released) to now.

Be willing to accept your mistakes, work on them and improve upon yourself.

Hopefully this has helped.

Heyo! You're probably looking for the Team Recruitment sub-boards instead of the Gameplay & Strategy sub-boards. It's no problem, but be sure to familiarise yourself with each sub-board's Culture and Guidelines :)

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment
